ResearchProjectDef.label: Jet transport l
ResearchProjectDef.description: Reusable jet capsules that allow you to transport a large amount of cargo.

rulesStrings.li: subject->Very fast transport
subject_story->Transport capsules allow you to move very quickly through suborbital flight
subject_story->Unlike disposable capsules, we can fly many times
subject_gerund->Fly as much as you want

rulesStrings.li: subject->Very fast and heavy-duty transport
